channel.title: [OverloadX] Adding a SafePK Area
channel.description:
How can I add a SafePK area where players can PK without loosing their items? I'm pretty new to coding, so if you do have instructions, try to give them with extra detail. This is an important goal for me so if someone can help me out that would be great.
Resent
